long_description:
Stakbox Battlehammer
--------------------

This mod adds a battlehammer weapon to MTG. It hits much slower than a sword, but has much greater knockback.
It can also double as a pickaxe, digging at a speed 1 tier slower than a pickaxe made of the same material.

At this point, the knockback effect works only on Mobs Redo API mobs.
name: s_weapons
short_description: Adds a battlehammer weapon with high knockback for MTG (compatible only with Mobs Redo API).
title: S Battlehammer
